document.heading: Gallery Place Economic Development Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-241, the “Gallery Place Economic Development Amendment Act of 2000”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-877, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 8, 2000, and December 5, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 21, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-519 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-241 became effective on April 3, 2001.
